javascript:!function(){var n=document.createElement("div"),t={hour:"2-digit",minute:"2-digit"};function e(){n.textContent="ðŸ•’ "+Intl.DateTimeFormat("en-GB",t).format(new Date)}n.setAttribute("style","\n    position: absolute;\n    top: 0px;\n    left: 0px;\n    z-index: 2147483647;\n    color: silver;\n    letter-spacing: 3px;\n    background: black;\n    font-family: Arial, Verdana;\n    font-size: 16pt;\n    padding-right: 10px;\n    font-weight: bold;\n\n"),document.body.appendChild(n),e(),setInterval(e,1e3)}();
